name: VZVirtioSocketDevice
desc: A device that manages port-based connections between the guest system and the host computer.

items.name: func setSocketListener(VZVirtioSocketListener, forPort: UInt32)
items.desc: Configures an object to monitor the specified port for new connections.

items.name: func removeSocketListener(forPort: UInt32)
items.desc: Removes the listener object from the specfied port.

items.name: func connect(toPort: UInt32, completionHandler: (Result<VZVirtioSocketConnection, Error>) -> Void)
items.desc: Initiates a connection to the specified port of the guest operating system.
